trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
If patternInterface is or , this method returns a `this` pointer; otherwise, this method returns `null`.
Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
Gets the state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
The state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
`true` if the value is read-only; `false` if it can be modified.
Sets the value of a control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
The value to set.
The provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.
Gets the value of the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DatePickerAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IValueProvider> interface.
A string that represents the value of the control.
